text: Father Armand David (Espelette September 27, 1826 near Bayonne –November 10, 1900 in Paris) was a Lazarist missionary Catholic priest as well as a zoologist and a botanist. He discovered many new species in China. The best- known of the animals he discovered are the Giant Panda and the Père David's Deer and the Dove tree, Davidia involucrata Category:1826 births Category:1900 deaths Category:French botanists Category:French Roman Catholic priests Category:Roman Catholic missionaries Category:French zoologists Category:People from Bayonne
title: Armand David
